```{r}
# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Consolidate nuc_contour based on observation and types of register shift.
  mutate(
    nuc_contour =
      if_else(
        nuc_contour == "^[L*H %]" | nuc_contour == "^[L*H L%]",
        "^[L*H] %",
        if_else(nuc_contour == "L*^[H L%]", "L*^[H] %", nuc_contour)
      ),
    acc_phon =
      factor(
        str_replace(nuc_contour,
                    "\\s%$|\\sL%$",
                    ""),
        levels = c("H*", "L*H", ">H*", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")
      ),
    fin_phon = str_replace_all(fin_phon, "L%]|%]", "%")
  ) %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    nuc_contour,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    
    utt_mean_f0,
    utt_lh_slope,
    
    lh_mean_f0,
    lh_slope,
    
    utt_mean_f0_z,
    utt_lh_slope_z,

    lh_mean_f0_z,
    lh_slope_z,
    
    l_f0_z,
    h_f0_z

  )

```


Density plot of PAs by lh mean f0 and lh_slope

```{r, fig.width=4, fig.height=3}
ggplot(m_corpus %>% filter(acc_phon %notin% c("H*", ">H*", "^[L*]H")),
       aes(y = lh_mean_f0_z, x = lh_slope, color = acc_phon)) +
  geom_point() +
  #stat_ellipse() +
  geom_density_2d() +
  #scale_color_manual(values = pitch_accent_colours) +
  xlim(-20, 100) +
  ylim(-4, 4)




m <- manova(cbind(lh_mean_f0_z, lh_slope) ~ acc_phon,
            data = m_corpus
            )

print(summary(m))

m <- manova(cbind(lh_mean_f0_z, lh_slope) ~ acc_phon,
            data = m_corpus %>% 
              filter(acc_phon %in% c("L*H", "L*^[H]")))

print(summary(m))

m <- manova(cbind(lh_mean_f0_z, lh_slope) ~ acc_phon,
            data = m_corpus %>% 
              filter(acc_phon %in% c("L*H", "^[L*H]")))

print(summary(m))

m <- manova(cbind(lh_mean_f0_z, lh_slope) ~ acc_phon,
            data = m_corpus %>% 
              filter(acc_phon %in% c("L*^[H]","^[L*H]")))

print(summary(m))
```
